pkgmetadata.longdescription: Liferea is a news aggregator for RDF/RSS/CDF/Atom/Echo/etc feeds. It's based on gnome and xulrunner/webkit.

use.flag: Enable support for Libsecret Support plugin that allows Liferea to use app-crypt/libsecret as password store
Enable support for Media Player plugin that allows to play music and videos directly from Liferea
Use NetworkManager to monitor nerwork status
Enable support for Popup Notifications plugin that display popups informing about new updates
Enable support for Tray Icon (GNOME Classic) plugin that display a small system tray icon to hide/unhide Liferea
